alert.note: Alert for Harding (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 5:54PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Harding and northwestern Butte Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 553 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Gustave to 9 miles southwest of Antelope Butte. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gustave and Antelope Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
